entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
